chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been returned to us. Please confirm with the customer if they wish for a reshipment or a refund. 

Thank you.

Regards,
Xt

Dear ecomobile

we forwarded the request to the costumer.

We will keep you updated ASAP.

Thank you.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

the package has been returned to sender.

Is it possible to send it with DHL?

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Can we confirm again that the customer wants a reshipment back to the address:

Florian Faber
Striehweg 13
72820 Sonnenbühl
Germany
0170 7838123

We are also currently checking with our logistic partner whether a different courier could be used to send back the parcel.

Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

the order arrived at your warehouse on 21.05.2024.

Please resend within 24 hours and provide me with a TL or we will have to make a refund.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately after checking with our logistic partner, they are unable to send it back with DHL. Is the customer still okay with us sending back with the same courier of UPS? Moreover, can we check again whether the customer wants a reshipment back to the address:

Florian Faber
Striehweg 13
72820 Sonnenbühl
Germany
0170 7838123

Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

you can send it by UPS

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The tracking number for this return shipment is 1ZBF1560D901121087.

Regards,
CH
